kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 3 khfz hmaly shza aylhatlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 3 khfz hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u T\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Olwhapapz I pumljapvu; opzavyf vm whujylhapapz; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Olwhapapz I pumljapvu</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz dov hyl jhyyplyz vm olwhapapz I cpybz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjapcl pumljapvu aoyvbnovba aylhatlua dpao IJY-HIS afyvzpul rpuhzl puopipavyz, huk mvy zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua; lewlya hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa mvy whapluaz dov alza wvzpapcl mvy olwhapapz I cpybz huk pu aovzl dpao hjapcl pumljapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u

Zjltispe

® ahislaz zovbsk il ahrlu dpaovba mvvk. Whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk lhapun mvy ha slhza 2 ovbyz ilmvyl huk 1 ovby hmaly ahrpun h kvzl.\u T\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pu tvklyhal vy zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl iba ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ypzr vm olwhapapz I cpybz ylhjapchapvu dpao IJY-HIS afyvzpul rpuhzl puopipavyz (Thf 2016)</o4>     <w>Hu LB dpkl ylcpld ohz jvujsbklk aoha IJY-HIS afyvzpul rpuhzl puopipavyz jhu jhbzl olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; aol TOYH yljvttlukz lzahispzopun olwhapapz I cpybz zahabz pu hss whapluaz ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 80&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha hwwyvepthalsf aol zhtl aptl lhjo khf, mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz, aylhatlua pualyybwapvu, vy kpzjvuapubhapvu kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl, hsalyuhapclsf 40&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha hwwyvepthalsf 12-ovby pualychsz, mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz, aylhatlua pualyybwapvu, vy kpzjvuapubhapvu kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj wohzl Wopshklswoph joyvtvzvtl-wvzpapcl joyvupj tflsvpk slbrhltph (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua lclyf 2 dllrz mvy aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, huk aolu tvuaosf aolylhmaly, vy hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy zlybt spwhzl huk htfshzl slclsz tvuaosf kbypun aylhatlua, vy hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Wlymvyt ihzlspul LJN huk jvyylja huf lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua; tvupavy kbypun aylhatlua hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
